org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.ws.component

Class ErrorAwareWebServiceMessageReceiverHandlerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.ws.transport.support.WebServiceMessageReceiverObjectSupport
      • org.springframework.ws.transport.http.WebServiceMessageReceiverHandlerAdapter
        • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.ws.component.ErrorAwareWebServiceMessageReceiverHandlerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ErrorCodeAwareWebServiceMessageReceiverHandlerAdapter

    public class ErrorAwareWebServiceMessageReceiverHandlerAdapter
extends org.springframework.ws.transport.http.WebServiceMessageReceiverHandlerAdapter
    Spring WS error handler that returns SOAP fault message when there is error during XML parsing in incoming message.
    Author:
    Petr Juza
